description: This U806 is the latest 2010 version, equipped with a 4-in-1 infra-red receiver (Gyro, ESC, Mixer, Receiver). It is able to move in 3 Direction base on the 3 Channels, anyone can hover it easily. It even has a Remote Light Switch on the transmitter which is able to turn on the light on-broad the helicopter during a flight, very interesting feature. Since it is made with light weight plastic, the main structure is able to survive many crashes, perfect for very first time beginners.
title: UDI U806 Infrared Remote Control Helicopter W/gyro - RED

description: Numicon builds a deep understanding of maths through a multi-sensory approach, developing children's fluency, reasoning and problem-solving. The Numicon Large Set of Number Rods contains 126x centimetre scale, coloured Number Rods from lengths 1cm-10cm, supplied in a durable plastic tray, which are useful for many Numicon activities for children in Key Stage 1. Use alongside the Numicon Teaching Resources for maximum impact. Extra apparatus is available separately. Not suitable for children under 36 months due to small parts.
title: Oxford Ort Packs Numicon Cuisenaire Rods Small Set

description: These stacking, coloured trays match the number rods. Useful for building number bonds and pattern making. Not suitable for children under 36 months due to small parts.

description: Punderdome, the card game, was inspired by the original live game show The Punderdome, a cult favorite in Brooklyn nightlife. Grab some friends, draw two cards, and make bad puns connecting the prompts. One part game, one part conversation starter, you don't need to be a pun master to master Punderdome: the goal is to make bad jokes and have fun along the way. Includes: 110 White Cards, 110 Green Cards, 1 Set of Instructions, 1 Just for Pun! Card, 2 Mystery Envelopes, 1 Pad of Mystery Envelope Slips, 6 Small Pads and more!.
title: Penguin Random House Punderdome Deluxe Card Game

description: The lovable, mischievous little gorilla, who crawls into bed with the zookeeper and his wife in Good Night, Gorilla, is now ready to crawl into bed with children. Perfect for storytime, playtime--and bedtime--this eight-inch-tall plush doll is soft and huggable.

description: A famous card expert demonstrates tricks that have left theater audiences amazed and that card-playing professionals have used profitably. It is not a book for beginners. But these shifts, palms, glides, false shuffles, cuts, fans, steals and spectacular deceptions will help those with basic card expertise reach new levels of performance. Over 300 photos.
title: MMS Card Control by Arthur H Buckley - Book

description: Ten realistic renderings of popular dinosaurs include images of the three-horned triceratops, the stegosaurus and its bony plates, the spiky styracosaurus, and the fearsome king of them all, tyrannosaurus. Designed to stay bright and colorful for days, these tattoos can be easily removed with alcohol or baby oil.
title: Dinosaur Tattoos

description: Ahoy, me hearties! you ready to hit the deck with these symbols of the swashbuckling life? Show the world that you take no prisoners with ten colorful tattoos, including the Jolly Roger, a mighty galleon under full sail, cutlass-wielding cutthroats (with and without parrots), and other piratical images.
title: Pirates Tattoos

description: This space age character is likely to pop up where — and whenever you want him to. The winsome little robot comes with 38 mix-and-match sticker parts that will change the shape of his arms, legs, and even his face. Colorful accessories make the little guy even more fun to play with.

description: Ten fun stories help you learn 100 essential high- frequency words. Practice again and again! Magic pen reads the books to you! Includes The Ants Go Marching; Big Pig; Dogs, Dogs, Dogs; Glad Fish, Sad Fish; Happy Cats; A Lot of Legs; Monkeys See, Monkeys Do; Penguin Pal; The Three Bears; Who Says; talking pen; and carrying case. Electronic pen is designed to work exclusively with all ten books in this pack. 2 AA batteries not included. * Skills: Phonics, Reading Comprehension, High-Frequency Words, Sight Words Book Details * Number of pages: 8 pages each * Size: 5" x 5"
title: Talk-to-Me Amazing Animals Phonics Boxed Set With Magic Talking Pen & 10 Books

description: Pom-Pom Puppies is the cutest breed of pom-pom titles from Klutz. Our exclusive pom-pom maker lets kids easily make the color on each pup perfect, and then follow the simple step-by-step instructions to create the most popular dog breeds. Card-stock punch-outs provide all the extras every well-equipped pup requires, from tags to collars to carrying cases. It's everything you need to make dog-gone cute new best friends.

description: Air Power pushes the limits of air-propelled fun with 4 easy-to-assemble vehicles. Young speed demons can race a hot rod across the floor, glide a hovercraft over the dining room table, fly a helicopter around the room, and blast off with a balloon-powered rocket. Tinker, experiment, explore, and learn the science and history of rocket power.
title: Klutz Air Power: Rocket Science Made Simple Craft Kit

description: Pete the Cat creator James Dean designed this boldly colored puzzle just for fans of the cool cat! 35 oversized pieces.

description: Klutz introduces a no-heat, mess-free way to tackle the ancient art of batik in your very own home. With over 50 designs, custom color recipes, and tricks for splatters, ombre, space-dye and more, you'll design & dye the 10 included fabric swatches with ease. Get inspired by ideas throughout the book to mix and match the same motifs on your own tees, tanks, totes, and any other basics that could use a splash of color.

description:
Which are YOU - An Apothecary Healer or a Lord of Pestilence? Choose your destiny and determine the course of events in the ground-breaking new game from NerdcoreLearning.


Developed by two physician/gamers, Francis Kong and Arun Mathews, The Healing Blade plunges the player into a world of sorcery and creatures, where real world knowledge of infectious diseases and therapeutics play a pivotal role in the winning strategy. 


Choose one of two sides:*The Apothecaries, Champions of the Healing Blade whose namesakes hearken from real world antibiotics.*The Lords of Pestilence, Creatures of Disease and manifestations of actual bacterial agents


As you and your opponent seek domination through corruption and conquest, you must vie not only with brute force, but also with planning, strategy, and most importantly, an astute understanding of microbiology and medical therapeutics.


Healing Blade gives you the unparalleled opportunity to enter a fantasy realm where the rules of combat deeply and accurately reflect the real world's battles against infectious disease. Reshape the Battlefield Zone to your advantage. At every turn you control the forces and special conditions that can influence the outcome of each encounter. Each Champion has a unique set of gifts and abilities, and can be upgraded to powerful adversaries by way of real-world phenomena such as resistance and synergy. Summon forth living manifestations of diseases, or counter-attack with antibiotics in the form of powerful warriors.


Players: 2

Ages: 12 & up

Playing Time: 30 minutes

Includes:


*2 Instruction Guides

*2 Playmats

*90 High-quality, Fully-detailed Playing Cards

*20 ATP Markers
title: Healing Blade

description: This fast-paced therapeutic card game helps children ages 6-12: Control their anger in the moment; Practice 12 effective anger management techniques; Understand what anger feels and looks like; Avoid anger-provoking situations; Express and understand their feelings; Identify anger cues; Learn that they have choices about how to express anger. Mad Dragon plays like the popular game UNO. Players race to get rid of their cards while learning anger control skills. Fun and effective, this game includes 100 high-quality 3" x 4 1/2" cards, instructions, and tips for taming anger. For 2 to 8 players.
title: Mad Dragon: An Anger Control Card Game
